Name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
Title: Boundless Blessing: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
Desc: "When flowers bloom, when leaves sway, that is me who sings the songs of freedom, of the winds."

Talent.Name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>For each point of "Bonus DMG" this card has, character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> This card gains 1 point of <color=#FFFFFFFF>"Bonus DMG"</color>. (Max 2 points)\n(Can only be equipped by <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#3201}Catalyst Characters</color>. Each Character can equip at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon.)
